programme.desc: David is embarrassed by a childhood issue that resurfaces, while Johnny, Stevie, and Roland attend a viewing for a motel nearby.

programme.desc: With her investigation in full swing, Kate zeroes in on Mickey.

programme.desc: Agent Cooper and Sheriff Truman discover more about the secret life of murdered Laura, as Mrs. Palmer has a terrible vision.
